title: Anyone know how to check your account creation date
body: I need help trying to find me creation date. If there's a site out there can you send it to me. If not just tell me my creation date. [IGN : Lava Teemo (chiu5b before the name change]

replies.body: Look for the email you got when you signed up.
Account creation date is not available info.  It's part of the account recovery process, so it's super important to keep that info safe if you know it.  Let me know if you have any questions!
